data.description:
Experience the world of Chimp Run, where you can run, hide, and jump! Step into the world of a monkey species that we've created exclusively for this game. Embark on exciting adventures across a variety of maps, including the Forest, Shop, Dropper, Tag and even a Horror Mode, sandbox will be added soon! Engage with other players through our multiplayer feature, fostering a sense of community as you explore Chimp Run together. If you prefer playing with a specific group, easily join a random server accessible from your area!

Express your unique style by customizing your appearance. Personalize your name tag, choose different colors, and enhance your character with cosmetic items available for purchase using our virtual currency called, "Nebulas". Head over to the shop to browse a wide selection of cosmetics. When you've made your choice, buy it wisely so you don't lose your tokens, equip them conveniently from the same place!

Chimp Run is updated with fresh content, including new maps and cosmetics, ensuring there's always something exciting to discover. So why wait? Join the adventure and start playing today! More Updates Coming Soon!

Tell us in our discord if there is anybody violating our rules! https://discord.gg/Vtmcp8Xnvq
